circles.name: Encourage Circle

rules: Be respectful and kind to all members

circles.name: Mindful Meditation
circles.about: Join our daily meditation sessions and mindfulness practices. Find inner peace, reduce stress, and connect with like-minded individuals on a journey of self-discovery.
rules: Maintain a peaceful and respectful environment

recentActivity.author: David Chen
recentActivity.content: Today's meditation focus: Gratitude. Take 5 minutes to appreciate the small joys in your life üå∏

circles.name: Fitness Warriors
circles.description: Motivate each other to stay healthy and strong
circles.about: A private community for fitness enthusiasts to share workout routines, healthy recipes, and motivate each other on our wellness journey.
rules: Members must be approved by admins
Share fitness tips and healthy lifestyle content
No body shaming or negative comments

rules: Respect all forms of artistic expression
